typedef long long int ull;
 
int josephus(int n,int k)
{
int i,val;
val=1;
for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
val = (val+k-1)%i+1;
return val;
}
 
 
int main()
{
int n,k,t;
read(t);
while(t--)
{
scanf("%d %d",&n,&k);
write(josephus(n,k*(n+1)));
}
//system("pause");
return 0;

}
